name: Reality Quest
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Due to the school bully&#039s threat to get him game items, Ha Do-wan, the unlucky game shuttle, died after playing games all night long for a week. The moment he died, he got respawned to the classroom one week before he died... Everything is the same as that day. The only thing that has changed is the floating in front of him! What? Use the skills of the games I&#039ve played so far to beat the bully?!?!
